name: Delivery points in the US - United States Postal Service (2018)
title: Delivery points in the US - United States Postal Service (2018)
description:
Source notes: In 2004, the Postal Service refined its reporting of addresses on rural and highway contract routes by no longer
counting vacant addresses (unoccupied for more than 90 days) and addresses of customers who received mail solely
via Post Office box. Numbers may not add up due to rounding.

sources.name: United States Postal Service (2018)
sources.dataPublisherSource: 1905-1970, Annual Report of the Postmaster General; 1971-2010, Comprehensive Statement on Postal Operations; since 2011, Annual Report to Congress and Comprehensive Statement on Postal Operations
sources.additionalInfo:
Source notes: In 2004, the Postal Service refined its reporting of addresses on rural and highway contract routes by no longer
counting vacant addresses (unoccupied for more than 90 days) and addresses of customers who received mail solely
via Post Office box. Numbers may not add up due to rounding.
